decision_conditions:
The description of works for this Notification includes replacement of the tree to be removed and this decision is mindful of and influenced by this. In this instance, the Council will require the tree to be replaced. 

The position of the tree need not be identical to that of those removed but should be in the rear garden.

The following species are recommended: Any fruit variety, as suggested by the applicant. 

The planting shall be undertaken in the first planting season [November to March] or part thereof following the commencement of works on site as agreed
under the work to trees application. The Local Planning Authority shall also be informed in writing once the replacement tree[s] has [have] been planted. 

Failure to comply with this statutory requirement may result in the issue of a 'Tree Replacement Notice' under section 207 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 (Conifer) - Remove and grind stump.   T2 (Pittosporum) -   Reduce by 5 meters to fence height.  (summary)
